string.text: You encounter a mysterious merchant on the roadside. He opens a worn chest, and a strange glow emanates from within. 'Only 100 gold, and this treasure is yours,' he says, a cunning glint in his eyes.
[Charm 50+] Try to haggle down to 50 gold
You open the package to find a treasure map! Following its directions, you discover a small fortune nearby.
You open the package to find nothing but rocks and a mocking note. The merchant has vanished without a trace...
Deep into the night, you notice the guard seems to be dozing off. The keys hang from their belt, swaying gently with each breath. This might be your chance to escape...
Create a distraction and attempt to escape
Too risky, wait for a better opportunity
One of the prisoners in your party falls to their knees before you, begging: 'Please let me go! I'll serve you, I'll do anything!'
Beat them as an example to others
You discover a hidden campsite that looks like a good place to rest. You could take a break here to recover your strength.
Rest here for a few hours
No time to rest, keep moving
After a few hours of rest, you feel energized and ready to continue your journey.
Battle cries erupt ahead! A group of bandits bursts from the bushes, surrounding your party. 'Leave your money and you can go!' the lead bandit roars.
You successfully repelled the bandit ambush! While searching the battlefield, you find some loot.
You were defeated by the bandits... They looted your belongings and left you on the roadside.
